name: few minutes
author: Fewminutesapp

sections.description:
Fewer is better

Your audience knows their schedule best.

Give them access to the right content at the right time.

Match expectations with your visitors

Let visitors sort content by reading time to boost engagement.

Increase pageviews

When expectations are met, you can increase pageviews up to 20%

Web & Mobile second skin

Integrate your web and mobile apps with Few second skin for a seamless experience.

Get The mobile app >

We’re real people who happen to really like storytelling.

We also care what you think.

Get in touch at: team@fewminutesapp.com

sections.faq:
What can i do with few Minutes Plug in?

Match expectations with your visitors

Let visitors sort content by reading time to boost engagement.

Increase pageviews

When expectations are met, you can increase pageviews up to 20%

How to use few?

Each invitation have a unique shortcode. You can position it in your post or page editor. few time stamp allows you match expectations with your users on reading time of each story
